SPSRQMetadata.Description: Sensitivity to Punishment and Sensitivity to Reward Questionnaire

spsrq_1.Description: Do you often refrain from doing something because you are afraid of it being illegal?

spsrq_2.Description: Does the good prospect of obtaining money motivate you strongly to do some things?

spsrq_3.Description: Do you prefer not to ask for something if you are not sure you will obtain it?

spsrq_4.Description: Are you frequently encouraged to act by the possibilty of being valued in your work, in your studies, with your friends or with your family?

spsrq_5.Description: Are you often afraid of new or unexpected situations?

spsrq_6.Description: Do you often meet people that you find physically attractive?

spsrq_7.Description: Is it difficult for you to telephoen someone you don't know?

spsrq_8.Description: Do you like taking some drugs because of the pleasure you get from them?

spsrq_9.Description: Do you often renounce your rights when you know you can avoid a quarrel with a person or an organization?

spsrq_10.Description: Do you often do things to be praised?

spsrq_11.Description: As a child, were you troubled by punishments at home or in school?

spsrq_12.Description: Do you like being the center of attention at a party or a social meeting?

spsrq_13.Description: In tasks that you are not prepared for, do you attach great importance to the possibilty of failure?

spsrq_14.Description: Do you spend a lot of your time on obtaining a good image?

spsrq_15.Description: Are you easily discouraged in difficult situations?

spsrq_16.Description: Do you need people to show their affection for you all the time?

spsrq_18.Description: When you are with a group, do you try to make your opinions the most intelligent or the funniest?

spsrq_19.Description: Whenever possible, do you avoid demonstrating your skills for fear of being embarrassed?

spsrq_20.Description: Do you often take the opportunity to pick up people you find attractive?

spsrq_21.Description: When you are with a group, do you have difficulties selecting a good topic to talk about?

spsrq_22.Description: As a child, did you do a lot of things to get people's approval?

spsrq_23.Description: Is it often difficult for you to fall asleep when you think about things you have done or must do?

spsrq_24.Description: Does the possibility of social advancement, move you to action, even if this involves not playing fair?

spsrq_25.Description: Do you think a lot before complaining?

spsrq_26.Description: Do you generally give preference to those activities that imply an immediate gain?

spsrq_27.Description: Would you be bothered if you had to return to a store when you noticed you were given the wrong change?

spsrq_28.Description: Do you often have trouble resisting the temptation of doing forbidden things?

spsrq_29.Description: Whenever you can, do you avoid going to unknown places?

spsrq_30.Description: Do you like to compete and do everything you can to win?

spsrq_31.Description: Are you often worried by things you said or did?

spsrq_32.Description: Is it easy for you to associate tastes and smells to very pleasant events?

spsrq_33.Description: Would it be difficult for you to ask your boss for a raise (salary increase)?

spsrq_34.Description: Are there a large number of objects or sensations that remind you of pleasant events?

spsrq_35.Description: Do you generally avoid speaking in public?

spsrq_36.Description: When you start to play with a slot machine, is it often difficult for you to stop?

spsrq_37.Description: Do you, on a regular basis, think that you could do more things if it was not for your insecurity or fear?

spsrq_38.Description: Do you sometimes do things for quick gains?

spsrq_39.Description: Comparing yourself to people you know, are you afraid of many things?

spsrq_40.Description: Does your attention easily stray from your work in the presence of an attractive stranger?

spsrq_41.Description: Do you often find yourself worrying about things to the extent that performance of intellectual abilities is impaired?

spsrq_42.Description: Are you interested in money to the point of being able to do risky jobs?

spsrq_43.Description: Do you often refrain from doing something you like in order not to be rejected or disapproved by others?

spsrq_44.Description: Do you like to put competitive ingredients in all of your activities?

spsrq_45.Description: Generally, do you pay more attention to threats than to pleasant events?

spsrq_46.Description: Would you like to be a socially powerful person?

spsrq_47.Description: Do you often refrain from doing something because of your fear of being embarrassed?

spsrq_48.Description: Do you like displaying your physical abilities even though this may involve danger?
